description:
The gang finds a strange doll in the trash. Satsuki prevents Keiichiro from bringing the doll home, but it shows up regardless. And then, late at night, Satsuki gets a phone call from none other than the doll herself! With the doll stalking her relentlessly, how will she ever be rid of it?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hanasu Meili Ningyou!! Kyoufu no Kage
話すメリー人形!! 恐怖の影
